text: At first we download the wallet in android or windows, then we register our wallet and start having all this benefits:

benefits.text: Obtain CC from the bounty system (If you are Venezuelan)
Get assets, food or play the lottery

text: If you are foreign you can get CC from any venezuelan via the exchanges that is willing to sell you, by doing that you are helping someone that will spend that money in goods for his family and therefore all the people in Venezuela.
